title: Puffing Billy
brief_description: Newsreel item from 1954 about the steam train “Puffing Billy” making its journey from Ferntree Gully in the Dandenong Ranges in Victoria. At Ferntree Gully, the train is shown with hundreds of children on board. Shows people waving and taking photographs as the train leaves the station to wind its way through the countryside.
